prompt: Realistic, Image, Realistic Persons, FULL DETAILLED, An inspiring digital artwork blending technology and human creativity — a futuristic yet warm atmosphere showing a young person learning about artificial intelligence, surrounded by glowing data streams, neural network patterns, and holographic interfaces. The mood is hopeful, motivating, and forward-looking, symbolizing curiosity and innovation.  Include bold, elegant embedded text in the image that reads: “Learn AI. Shape Tomorrow.” "AI won’t replace you — but those who learn it will"  ---  Style the typography in a clean, modern sans-serif font (like Futura or Helvetica Neue), glowing slightly with soft blue-white tones to blend with the futuristic ambiance.  The background should have an inspiring balance — not too cluttered — with a composition perfect for an Instagram post (1:1 aspect ratio).  Visual style: cinematic lighting, ultra-realistic, high dynamic range, subtle depth of field, slightly ethereal glow, 8K resolution, color palette of blue, white, and soft gold for inspiration.  Mood keywords: motivation, innovation, learning, hope, technology, creativity, future.  Format: Instagram-ready square image (1:1), perfect center composition for social media quote post.
text_responses: Here's your image, designed for Instagram with the text "Learn AI. Shape Tomorrow." and "AI won’t replace you — but those who learn it will" seamlessly integrated into the futuristic scene.
